full_description:
Samsung 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR18CVFYAWKWFE)

The Samsung 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR18CVFYAWKWFE) uses the Digital Inverter Boost technology with an 8-pole design, it delivers consistent cooling performance while consuming minimal power, evident in its 2-star energy-saving rating. With a cooling capability of 18000 Btu/hr and coverage reaching up to 180 square feet, it ensures efficient cooling in medium-sized spaces. The DuraFin Plus copper condenser and BLDC compressor of the Samsung 1.5-ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR18CVFYAWKWFE) guarantee dependability and longevity. The inclusion of features like ECO Mode, AI Auto Cooling, and Fast Cool offers personalized comfort and energy savings. The copper anti-bacterial filter guarantees clean air circulation, while the Filter Cleaning Indicator simplifies maintenance. its capabilities provide remote control and monitoring using the SmartThings app, allowing for seamless integration with smart home systems. The Samsung 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR18CVFYAWKWFE) with a 24-hour timer, Auto Restart function, and Auto Mode for hassle-free operation, this air conditioner offers both convenience and performance. With a power consumption of 1950 W, it strikes a balance between efficiency and cooling prowess, making it a smart choice for modern households seeking optimal comfort and sustainability.

Samsung 2 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR24CVFYAWKUFE)

product_page_short_description: AC Technology: Digital Inverter (8 Pole technology)
Features: 3 Care Filter, Twin Tube Muffler
full_description:
Samsung 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR12TVHYDWKUFE)

The Samsung 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR12TVHYDWKUFE) comes with highly energy-efficient Digital Inverter Boost technology. It maintains the desired temperature with less fluctuation. It also has neodymium magnets and a Twin Tube Muffler, so it works efficiently, and quietly and lasts much longer. And it reduces energy usage by up to 73%. This AC can cool rooms quickly from corner to corner, so you’re always comfortable. Digital Inverter Boost technology cools the air 43% faster. Its advanced design also has a 15% larger fan, 18% wider inlet and a 31% wider blade. So cool air is dispersed farther and wider, reaching up to 15 meters.

Auto Clean

When the Samsung 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR12TVHYDWKUFE) is turned off the Auto Clean function automatically runs a fan to remove dust and moisture in the heat exchanger. So it stays clean and dry, which prevents the growth of bacteria and mildew.

Easy Filter Plus

The Samsung 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR12TVHYDWKUFE) features easy to clean anti-bacterial filter. The Easy Filter Plus is located outside, on the top, so it can easily be taken out and cleaned. Its dense mesh keeps the Heat Exchanger clean and an anti-bacterial coating helps protect you against dangerous airborne contaminants.

DuraFin

The Samsung 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR12TVHYDWKUFE) enhances the performance and efficiency of the Heat Exchanger using the DuraFin. It is made of a much denser material and is thicker in design. It's improved coating also has more corrosion resistance. So it passes the accelerated Sea Water Acetic Acid Test (SWAAT) for corrosion over 100 days.

Triple Protector Plus

Samsung AR12TVHYDWKUFE AC lets you enjoy a long-lasting performance in challenging environments. Triple Protector Plus technology prevents damage from power surges and fluctuating electrical currents. Its anti-corrosion coating also protects the condenser and cabinet in harsh conditions.

R410A Refrigerant

Samsung AR12TVHYDWKUFE air conditioner uses the R410a refrigerant gas which is Environmentally friendly to the ozone layer. It is more energy efficient since it absorbs and discharges heat better than other refrigerants. The best way to ensure you get the most energy efficiency in your cooling system is to invest in a unit that uses R410A refrigerant.

ECO Mode

Samsung AR12TVHYDWKUFE comes with ECO mode and uses less compressor capacity compared to Normal mode, which reduces energy consumption. It lets you cool more efficiently when it’s not too hot outside or save energy and money at any time, so you don’t have to worry about electricity bills.

In Bangladesh, you can get the original Samsung 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR12TVHYDWKUFE) From Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest Samsung Air Conditioners to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. The Samsung 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type AR12TVHYDWKUFE) comes with 01 Year Parts Warranty, 10 Years Compressor Warranty, 01 Year Free Service Warranty, and no warranty for Remote And Gas. (The Samsung warranty card must be kept for any warranty claim.)
